resources.string:
Profile lets you manage your money inflows and
outflows among multiple accounts.
This is default profile created to track your personal
expenses. Customize this profile as per your needs.
Tip: You can create more profiles later for managing\nprofessional or non-personal finance. Check \'Profiles\nand Accounts\' under settings
This profile is used to manage my\npersonal expenses
Each profile can have multiple accounts.\nThis is default account for default profile.\nCustomize this account as per your needs.
Tip: You can create an account for each of your bank\naccounts, credits cards, e-wallet, meal coupon cards,\ncash and so on.
Note: In case if you want to identify an account using\nsensitive information like account number, partially hide\nthem (For example: xxx123).
Tap on \'+\' to add new item and long press to edit
